SELECT csl.id lockId, ch.area apartmentName, '1' apartmentType, cau.username authUserName, ch.address houseAddress, cr.`name` roomNo, crc.customer_name customerName, crc.customer_phone customerPhone, csl.serial_num serialNum, csl.`status` communicationStatus, DATE_FORMAT( csl.install_time, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) installTime, cslg.gateway gateway, CONCAT(csl.remaining_battery, '%') remainingBattery, csls.network_status warningType FROM caspain_test.smart_lock csl LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_lock_status csls ON csls.lock_id = csl.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room cr ON csl.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_lock_gateway cslg ON cslg.id = csl.gateway_id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cr.house_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room_contract crc ON crc.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON crc.created_by_id = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( csl.is_delete != '1' OR csl.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( ch.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cr.is_delete != '1' OR cr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( crc.is_delete != '1' OR crc.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cslg.is_delete != '1' OR cslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND crc.`status` = 'active'
AND cslg.id = '${gatewayId}'
AND ch.area = '${apartmentName}'
AND cau.username = '${authUserName}'
AND ch.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND ch.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND ch.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND csl.`status` LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'

SELECT vsl.id lockId, va.`name` apartmentName, '0' apartmentType, cau.username authUserName, va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vrc.customer_name customerName, vrc.customer_phone customerPhone, vsl.serial_num serialNum, vsl.`status` communicationStatus, CONCAT(vsl.remaining_battery, '%') remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT( vsl.install_time, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) installTime, vslg.gateway gateway, vsls.network_status warningType FROM `volga_test`.smart_lock vsl LEFT JOIN volga_test.smart_lock_status vsls on vsls.lock_id=vsl.id LEFT JOIN volga_test.smart_lock_gateway vslg ON vslg.id = vsl.gateway_id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room vr ON vsl.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vr.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room_contract vrc ON vrc.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON vrc.created_by = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vsl.is_delete != '1' OR vsl.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vr.is_delete != '1' OR vr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vrc.is_delete != '1' OR vrc.is_delete IS NULL ) AND vrc.`status` = 'active'
AND vsl.serial_num = '${serialNum}'
AND vr.name LIKE '%${roomNo}%'
AND vrc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND vrc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND va.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND va.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND va.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND vsl.status LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'
